about_the_game: Go retro and experience the classic era of gaming once more. Convert your ships into pixel-themed variants to restore the 8-bit charm of the past. Conquer the stars, bit by bit!
detailed_description: Go retro and experience the classic era of gaming once more. Convert your ships into pixel-themed variants to restore the 8-bit charm of the past. Conquer the stars, bit by bit!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz 
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel Integrated HD4000 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB

short_description: Go retro and experience the classic era of gaming once more. Convert your ships into pixel-themed variants to restore the 8-bit charm of the past. Conquer the stars, bit by bit!
